main.name: Anshul Chaudhary
main.description: An Innovator at Heart, a Visionary in Practice: My journey in technology is a vibrant tapestry of creativity and problem-solving, dedicated to crafting solutions that not only meet the needs of today but also pave the way for the future
main.bio1: Hello, I'm Anshul Chaudhary, a passionate software engineer with a keen interest in Data Engineering and Anslysis. With diverse roles and projects in the tech industry, I've gained deep insights into programming languages and algorithm design. Currently pursuing a Masterâ€™s in Software Engineering Systems at Northeastern University to enhance my skills further.
main.bio2: At JPMorgan Chase & Co., I spent two years migrating trade management systems, resulting in significant gains in operational efficiency. Constantly seeking challenges, I'm driven by a commitment to continuous learning and innovation. I thrive on developing innovative solutions and making a meaningful impact in the tech community. With a desire to tackle new challenges head-on, I'm excited about the opportunities ahead.
main.contactmessage: Please fill the details below and I'll contact you ASAP!

education.degree: Master of Science, Software Engineering Systems
education.description: Course Work: Concepts of Object-Oriented Design, Data Science Engineering Methods
Course Work: Data Structures & Algorithms, Web Technologies, Database Management, Software Design, Data Mining, IOT

work.title: Software Engineer
description: Successfully collaborated on an Equity Trade Management project, focusing on the migration of a legacy system to a strategic platform, enhancing high-speed trade booking and significantly increasing operational efficiency by 80% through an automated Python workflow.

Spearheaded optimization of bulk booking processes with a GraphQL API, achieving a 66% reduction in execution time, and demonstrated expertise as a subject matter expert for key booking tools, contributing to resolving 30% of system booking issues.

Played a crucial role in team development and technological advancement, training new team members, debugging and re-engineering trade-syncing queries, and streamlining data capture across systems to reduce storage load and code redundancy.

publications.name: Detecting Malware, Malicious URLs and Virus Using Machine Learning and Signature Matching

activities.name: ISTE-VESIT: Student Chapter
activities.title: Chief Technical Officer
description: Led and made crucial decisions in the technical domain for the council, driving strategic initiatives and managed a team of 20 Council members, fostering collaboration ensuring alignment with organizational goals
Organized dynamic workshops on diverse technical topics, including Python, web development, ML, and big data, attracting and engaging over 100 attendees

work.title: Softawre Development
work.description: Design and implement innovative solutions for complex problems and improving experiences

work.title: Data Engineering
work.description: Build and maintain robust data pipelines, ensuring the efficient and reliable collection, using ETL tools

work.title: Prompt Engineering
work.description: Craft precise and context-aware prompts to get optimized responses from AI models.

work.title: Data Analysis
work.description: Analyze datasets to extract meaningful insights and make data-driven decisions for business

projects.title: Video Interview Website
projects.description: Django websites: a company website showcasing the orgs work and a web application for recording online interviews with a SQL database. The interview application offers user authentication, interview recording, and database management features for streamlined interview processes.

projects.title: Stock Close Price Prediction
projects.description: Employed a comprehensive Machine Learning approach, involving data collection, preprocessing, feature selection, algorithm evaluation, tuning, and validation, to create a precise model for predicting stock closing prices, offering valuable insights for investment decisions

projects.title: Malware Detection using ML
projects.description: Developed a desktop application and web extension to incoorporate machine learning models for malware detection in Windows files and to identify bad URLs. The models were build using random forest and logistic regression algoithms, with accuracy of 99% and 96% respectively.

projects.title: Customer Review Analysis
projects.description: Sentiment analysis on British Airways customer reviews involves data scraping, data preprocessing, data visualization, and the application of transformer-based models for sentiment classification, ultimately yielding valuable insights into customer opinions and feedback

projects.title: Content Management System
projects.description: Java Spring Boot and React-based Content Management System, similar to Canvas, enabling users (professors and students) to log in, access registered courses, and allowing professors to create quizzes, while administrators have special privileges to manage users, courses, and terms.

projects.title: Flight Booking Pattern
projects.description: Analyzing British Airways customer booking patterns by processing and visualizing booking data. It also includes predictive modeling to uncover insights into customer behavior and preferences, potentially improving marketing strategies and enhancing customer experiences.

extra_projects.title: CNN Digit Classification
extra_projects.description: CNN model for digit identification using the TMNIST dataset. The model architecture includes convolutional layers for feature extraction, max-pooling layers for spatial reduction, and fully connected layers for classification. It aims to accurately classify hand-written digits (0-9)

extra_projects.title: Event Management System
extra_projects.description: Platform for event registration and reporting it offers user authentication and provides super admin privileges for managing departments, committees, and student bodies. The system allows faculty and selected students to register events, with a hierarchical approval process.

extra_projects.title: E-commerce Website
extra_projects.description: E-commerce Website is a feature-rich platform built with the Laravel framework and a SQL database. It includes user authentication, a wide product catalog, category-based parts suggestions, dynamic cart updates, secure transactions, and responsive design
